documentation.description: Retrieves anomaly detection job results for one or more influencers.

job_id.description: Identifier for the anomaly detection job

size.description: specifies a max number of influencers to get

start.description: start timestamp for the requested influencers

end.description: end timestamp for the requested influencers

influencer_score.description: influencer score threshold for the requested influencers

sort.description: sort field for the requested influencers

desc.description: whether the results should be sorted in decending order
